TextView.android:text: 1 Brief Forms Here are nine additional short forms for frequently used words.
2 Rd The combination rd can be represented by finishing the r with an upward curve.
3 Ld The combination ld is depicted by finishing the letter l with an upward curl.
4 Been in Phrases The word been is represented by b after have, has, had.
5 Able in Phrases The word able is represented by a after be or been.
